Jom Jang enjoys a certain amount of popularity due a OTOP (One Tambon One Product) scheme and homestay groups. The village also recently received local and national television coverage regarding a local project to plant sunflowers along the Mekong River.

- Visit the local women's group to sample local homemade snacks.

In the village, you can purchase local products made by the women's group, including salted egg, dried fish, and a variety of peanut snacks.
The village has a noodle shop.  In addition, you may arrange meals with the homestay and women's groups.
, take Bus 4537 in front of the village.
